ch.iserver.ace.net.core
Class RemoteUserProxyImpl

java.lang.Object
  ch.iserver.ace.net.core.RemoteUserProxyImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
RemoteUserProxyExt, RemoteUserProxy
public class RemoteUserProxyImpl
extends Object
implements RemoteUserProxyExt

Default implementation of type RemoteDocumentProxyExt.

This class embodies a remote user.

See Also:
RemoteUserProxyImpl

public boolean isSessionEstablished()
Checks whether the RemoteUserSession object is established for this user, i.e. a physical connection to this user exists.

Specified by:

Parameters:
value - the value to set

isDNSSDdiscovered

public boolean isDNSSDdiscovered()
Checks whether this user was discoverd by means of the automatic discovery mechanism. If false is returned, then the user was discovered explicitly, i.e. either by participating in another session or by explicitly connecting to that user.

Specified by:
isDNSSDdiscovered in interface RemoteUserProxyExt
Returns:
true iff this user was discovered by the automatic discovery mechanism.

discover

public void discover()
              throws DiscoveryException
Explicit discovery of this user. As precondition, the address and the port need to be set. Tries to establish a RemoteUserSession with the given information and requests the users coordinates, e.g. the user id and the user name.

Specified by:
discover in interface RemoteUserProxyExt
Throws:
DiscoveryException - if the discovery fails
